html:
** Affirm Holdings AFRM.O prices convertible debt offering, raising more capital than targeted. Shares down ~1% premarket

** Buy now, pay later firm announces $1.5 bln 5-yr convertible bonds (CBs) deal (Full Story)

** CBs will not bear interest; conversion price of $216.65 represents 55% premium to stock's Thurs close of $139.13

** AFRM shares on Thurs fell 8.3% after co launched $1.25 bln offering for general corp purposes, fund future growth

** Capital raise comes a week after AFRM said it expanded its partnership with Amazon.com AMZN.O (Full Story)

** AFRM has ~$39 bln market cap, per Refinitiv data

** Co raised $~1.4 bln in Jan IPO priced at $49. Its stock hit $176.65 record high on Nov 8


(Lance Tupper is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)

(( lance.tupper@thomsonreuters.com
